page.title: 14Hobbies.
page.content: After school on Tuesday afternoon,I play badminton at Canford Heath Community Centre.There is only one court in the hall.Badminton is a good sport and hobby.I have a Slazenger racket which is quite heavy for me.I am quite good at half court singles.The lady who teaches us is called Margaret Bainton. My name is Robert. I am 12 years old. When I get home from school I go over the heath to play on the B.M.X track called the humps'n'bumps.It was made by some chidren who live on the heath. It has got whoops,step- ups,camels and speed jumps.I have got a Viceroy B.M.X bike with CW handlebars and 2 different coloured tyres.I have got a B.M.X ramp that I made in the summer holidays and I have got a Trax Pro B.M.X helmet which is black and yellow to match the colour of my bike.
